title: Stylish Saudi Arabia Escape in UNESCO World Heritage Oasis
description: Windswept golden dunes, graceful date palms and hidden mountain springs await with a five-star stay at InterContinental Al Ahsa, an IHG Hotel, in the heart of the worldâ€™s largest oasis. Saudi Arabia's shining gem, Al Ahsa is a UNESCO World Heritage-listed locale that's brimming with adventure. Enjoy authentic Lebanese plates and lush gardens at Al Bustan Restaurant, sumptuous high tea at Al Maha Lounge or sit back and soak in tremendous panoramic views of the city and beyond.
location_description: InterContinental Al Ahsa, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: King Khalid Rd, Al Malik, Al Hofuf 31982, Saudi Arabia
